    • Constructor Detail

      • TimedGame

        public TimedGame(boolean whiteStart,
                 double timeInSeconds,
                 double incrementInSeconds,
                 javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                 int timertype)
        Constructs a new Game belonging to a stage
        Parameters:
        whiteStart, - the starting position of the Game Board object
        timeInSeconds, - the total time for each side
        incrementInSeconds, - the increment in seconds after a move
        stage, - the stage game belongs to
        timertype, - the type of timer used in game re construction
